Keywords: Cosmic , Mystical , Past , Ruler
Real Name: Merlyn
Special Powers
THE HOLY REPUBLIC OF FAE: During each player's turn, that player can't give their characters FREE actions if they've already given a number of FREE actions equal to their Action Total that turn.
THE MERLIN STONES: Invincible. // FREE: Roll a d6. 4-6: Heal Merlyn 1 click -or- modify Merlyn's defense +1 until your next turn.
THE MERCY OF THE GRAND HEIROPHANT: Perplex, Action Total +1.
